text: thumb | 220x124px | right Incredibles 2 is a 2018 American computer-animated movie produced by Pixar. It was directed by Brad Bird. It is the sequel to The Incredibles (2004) and second installment of the franchise. ==Release== Incredibles 2 was released by Walt Disney Pictures. It was released in the United States on June 15, 2018, in Disney Digital 3-D, Dolby Cinema and IMAX. ==Reputation== It received strong positive reviews. The movie made $182.7 million in its opening weekend, setting the record for best debut for an animated movie and has made over $1.1 billion worldwide, making it the second highest-grossing animated movie (behind Frozen) if you ignore inflation. After inflation, itâ€™s the fifth highest grossing animated movie. == Voice cast == Holly Hunter, Sarah Vowell and Samuel L. Jackson return in the movie; other stars include Huckleberry Milner (replacing Spencer Fox), Bob Odenkirk, Catherine Keener, Jonathan Banks (replacing Bud Luckey) and Sean Combs. ==Other websites== * * * Category:2010s sequel movies Category:2010s 3D movies Category:2018 computer-animated movies Category:2018 movies Category:American superhero movies Category:American sequel movies Category:The Incredibles Category:Movies about raccoons Category:Movies directed by Brad Bird Category:Movies composed by Michael Giacchino Category:2027 movies Category:Pixar Animation Studios films
title: Incredibles 2
